title: 55 years at Peking

The year was twenty hundred 'tis worth remembering
The Xi who lived through fifty-five years at Peking
T'was called the Xi jinping's Empire of pinky oriental war
Against all nations of the diplomatic core
Virus of France and Britain
How they fluttered in the breeze
The Italian and the Russian and virus of the Japanese
Then came the sound of bugles
And the rolling drums doom
And the streets of the world were as empty as a tomb

The Emperor of all China gave the signal to begin
And let the foreign devils be driven from the earth
They stormed the French Legation
They attacked with shot and shell
And they came in blood red blouses
Screaming shashow as they fell
The drums have long been muffled
The bugles cease to ring
But through the ages you can hear them echoing
